songs.title: “?”
songs.lyrics:
[Intro]
Young C in the building
Tell em say keep a con not green lit
I can smash that pussy like a beating
I can come back around like a remix
Hugs and kisses wrapped in a gift
Cause I only see you on Christmas
You know I ain't all for the distance
You know who to call when you miss this

[Verse: Nasty C]
Deafening emotions
The emotions are not in order
All this finders keepers
Business is null and void
I drifted
I drifted here without a choice
My memory is nothing but flashbacks and pictures and they all distorted
I got time to spend with you
If you willing
Call on a prince
And let's revisit the subjects
We haven't touched in our feelings
Cause ever since
We both made it
Never made time to talk and shit
On some across the border shit
But we're neighbors
We’re not neighbors
But I'm a flight away
Or really sure when at that, it's like I'm a mile away
And since you made it
You might just be forced to hide your face
And I dare you, to not just say

[Chorus: Shikanah]
You’re too far away, and (x2)
I can't make you stay
But oh I pray
For better days
To come my way
So now I'll wait, but
You’re too far away, and
I can't make you stay
But oh I pray
For better days
To come my way
So now I’ll wait
Cause I got keep running this race for you
But I just keep running away from you
And you just can't pick up the pace
Now that just makes me hate
Everything that we made come true
Eh

[Outro]
So tell me what we gonna do hey, do hey
What we gonna do hey, do hey
What we gonna do-ooo, do-ooo
Say what we gonna do-ooo, do-ooo
Say what we gonna do hey, do hey
Say what we gonna do hey
I'm too far away, and
You’re too far away, and
I can't make you stay
But ooh I pray
For better days
To come my way
But now I'll wait
